messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: An entity of unknown force was detected in the station, avoid any contact with the church and it followers, or you shall perish.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Custodial Closet.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You all feel into the tentation of the sin and turned your gave away your pure essence in exchange of pity gifts. You are too impure for forgiviness and in hell you shall stay forever. A force is coming to sail you there., and you shall welcome it with open arms.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unknown Transmission has renamed the station to "restart station 13".
